EnumValue.description: The object will pivot in Y dimension.

Component.name: Followable

PoseAttribute.name: offset
PoseAttribute.description: Pose offset to keep from target. Defining a quaternion will rotate the Entity

FloatAttribute.name: minAngle
FloatAttribute.description: Minimum Y angle offset a followable will keep from target, 0 is straight ahead, positive values\nare up, negative values are down

FloatAttribute.name: maxAngle
FloatAttribute.description: Maximum Y angle offset a followable will keep from target, 0 is straight ahead, positive values\nare up, negative values are down

EnumAttribute.name: type
EnumAttribute.description: The type of behavior an object has when following (faces user, pivots on y axis, etc.)

FloatAttribute.name: tolerance
FloatAttribute.description: This is the change in distance needed to start moving

FloatAttribute.name: speed
FloatAttribute.description: How fast followable tracks to its desired location. Float value is a percent of default speed

BooleanAttribute.name: active
BooleanAttribute.description: Whether entity is actively following or not
